title: Bug 124570 - Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session
description: Bug 124570 - Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session
OB: When using BIRT 2.0 RC2, the Preview option in the Web Viewer toolbar only displays the first report opened in a session, regardless of the report currently selected or opened.
EB: The Preview option in the Web Viewer toolbar should display the report that is currently selected or opened, allowing users to preview different reports within the same session.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open multiple reports in the Web Viewer. 
2. Select a different report from the list. 
3. Click on the Preview option in the toolbar. 
4. Observe that the Preview window still displays the first report opened, instead of the currently selected report.
